ABOUT_ELF.TITLE: What is Elf?
ABOUT_ELF.DESCRIPTION: Elf is a powerful, modern state management library for Angular. It is lightweight, tree-shakable, and provides a simple API for managing application state.
ABOUT_ELF.POINT1: Reactive state management for Angular apps.
ABOUT_ELF.POINT2: Inspired by Redux, but with less boilerplate.
ABOUT_ELF.POINT3: Integrates easily with RxJS and Angular ecosystem.
ABOUT_ELF.WHAT_YOU_DID: What was done in this project:
ABOUT_ELF.I18N: Internationalization (i18n) with ngx-translate for English and Portuguese.
ABOUT_ELF.ELF_CRUD: User CRUD using Elf for state management.
ABOUT_ELF.LANG_SWITCH: Language switcher with flag icons and runtime switching.
